description: This file is an HTML web page implementing a database visualizer interface. It contains the structure, styles, and client-side JavaScript code for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and shows data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates and inserts an HTML table from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell, handling long text and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full viewing.
